synonyms.synonym: Neuronal voltage-gated calcium channel gamma-3 subunit

protein.specific_function: Thought to stabilize the calcium channel in an inactivated (closed) state

reference.reference_text: Black JL 3rd, Lennon VA: Identification and cloning of putative human neuronal voltage-gated calcium channel gamma-2 and gamma-3 subunits: neurologic implications. Mayo Clin Proc. 1999 Apr;74(4):357-61.

Genomics. 1999 Sep 15;60(3):295-308.
